slim_seo.title: La Fiesta Furia - The Drake
slim_seo.description: The drama, the passion, the betrayal — it’s all coming to La Fiesta Furia presenta TELENOVELA. Step into a night of Latin pop nostalgia, forbidden romances, and chaotic dance floor storylines. From old Shakira and Thalía to reggaeton and guilty-pleasure anthems, we’re turning Toronto into a full-blown soap opera of love, glitter, and fury. Dress the part. Channel your inner Rubí, Soraya, or villainous twin — because in this story, you are the main character. Event Details Date: Friday, December 5 Time: 11 PM — late Venue: The Drake Underground (Unfortunately, not accessible) Coat Check: Yes 19+ only – Valid government-issued ID required Entry Policy To keep our space centered on the community: Straight cisgender men must be accompanied by two LGBTQI+ women or non-binary folks. Our Community Promise La Fiesta FURIA is a space of joy, safety, and respect. Harassment will be taken seriously. No tolerance for transphobia, racism, body shaming, or discrimination. Anyone disrespectful will be asked to leave. Photos & Videos Photos and videos will be taken throughout the night for future promotional use. By attending the event, you consent to appear in this content. If you prefer not to, just let our photographer know. Let’s dance, cry, and plot revenge together — this is La Fiesta Furia presenta TELENOVELA. One night only. Infinite drama.
